meaningMnemonic: If you use a <radical>sickle</radical> to kill a <radical>shrimp</radical> you'll need a really good <kanji>explanation</kanji> for yourself. What did that shrimp do to you? Why use a sickle? Well? What's your explanation?
readingMnemonic: In your <kanji>explanation</kanji> you blame everything on <reading>Shaq</reading> (しゃく). He told you to do it! It's all Shaq's fault, you explain.
